overview_of_class: For heritage learners with prior formal training in Spanish. Introduction to socio-political and linguistic richness of contemporary Spanish speaking countries. Emphasis on writing, syntax, and formal modes of the language.
name: Language in Context: Latinos, Language and Culture
title: WCAS SPANISH 197-0-20 Language in Context: Latinos, Language and Culture

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: For heritage learners with prior formal training in Spanish. Introduction to socio-political and linguistic richness of contemporary Spanish speaking countries. Emphasis on writing, syntax, and formal modes of the language.

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
descriptions.value: Prerequisite: Spanish heritage learners who have completed Spanish 121-3, Spanish 125-0, or Spanish 127-0. AP score of 4, or departmental Spanish Language Placement Exam

subject: SPANISH
